titleStmt.title: Jocabella, or a cabinet of conceits. Whereunto are added epigrams and other poems, by R. C.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

titleStmt.title: Jocabella, or a cabinet of conceits. Whereunto are added epigrams and other poems, by R. C.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R. Hodgkinson, for Daniel Frere, and are to be sold at the signe of the red Bu[ ] in Little Brittain,

notesStmt.note: STC (2nd ed.) reports title as: "Conceits, clinches, flashes, and whimzies. ... Jocabella, or a cabinet of conceits whereunto are added epigrams and other poems, by R. C.".
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2004 lacks all after signature I10.
Reproduction of original in the Edinburgh University Library.
